storyInfo: Laying low in Dzwonek, Szewczyk gets dragged into an explosion incident on his way to pick his son up from school.

attributes.content: November 30th 8:00 P.M.
Dzwonek
The Leithanians had high praise for our city's prosperity, and the parties quick reached an agreement.
attributes.name: TV News

attributes.content: It is expected that regular trade will be established between Dzwonek and the Leithanian city of Graufield.
attributes.name: TV News

attributes.content: A Leithanien-inspired commercial district is also currently under construction on a new plate, the first phase of a project focusing on Leithanian art and music.
attributes.name: TV News

attributes.content: A spokesman for contractor Gale Industries touted the design of the new district, the brainchild of a world-famous architect, and promised that it will become a new landmark for Kazimierz.
attributes.name: TV News

attributes.content: The project is expected to be a massive boon for the city's tourism industry...
attributes.name: TV News

attributes.content: (Oops, cut this one a little thin...)
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Honey?
attributes.name: Woman's Voice

attributes.content: Why don't you put that away? It's time to pick up our boy from school.
attributes.name: Woman's Voice

attributes.content: Can't he get home on his own?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: I know he says you're nosy, but he doesn't mean it.
attributes.name: Woman's Voice

attributes.content: Nosy, huh? He's got a noble knight picking him up personally, the ungrateful brat... He was having so much fun playing with those peasants.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Just be patient, dear. You said it yourself: people will forget all about 'Plastic' Szewczyk before long, and then we'll be safe.
attributes.name: Woman's Voice

attributes.content: ...Next up, new Infected riots have been reported in the Old District. The National Council is currently investigating the incidents.
attributes.name: TV News

attributes.content: The police have acknowledged that Zeno Shelvin, the Infected ringleader who had previously turned himself in, has escaped custody. A number of officers have been suspended in connection with the escape.
attributes.name: TV News

attributes.content: A reward is being offered for information regarding...
attributes.name: TV News

attributes.content: You heard the news, right? You should go soon.
attributes.name: Woman's Voice

attributes.content: We came all the way to Dzwonek, even living among the common folk, but it looks like trouble is never far away.
attributes.name: Woman's Voice

attributes.content: To think I used to be worried about you getting hurt in the arena, and now I'm worried about our little boy making it home from school.
attributes.name: Woman's Voice

attributes.content: You're overreacting. The press loves to exaggerate these things.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: If they were a real threat, we wouldn't be hearing about public investigations from the National Council.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: The only problem is the incompetent police who don't know how to track down the Infected without ID numbers. On their own, they're not much of a—
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Of course, the Infected make a good excuse to sell people insurance and protective gear. Especially after what happened at the Major.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Well... If it's so safe, why are you going out in full armor?
attributes.name: Woman's Voice

attributes.content: Alright, fine, then I won't worry, 'Sir Knight.'
attributes.name: Woman's Voice

attributes.content: This statue marks the edge of the Central District.
attributes.name: Dzwonek Rep

attributes.content: The outer plates are old, and there isn't much to see there.
attributes.name: Dzwonek Rep

attributes.content: May I inquire as to the containers stacked up over there?
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Ah... that's just an abandoned district.
attributes.name: Dzwonek Rep

attributes.content: There used to be a cargo passage leading down to the lower levels. After it was closed, old containers from decommissioned trucks began to pile up.
attributes.name: Dzwonek Rep

attributes.content: —O-Of course, we're currently working hard at giving Dzwonek a face-lift. Abandoned districts like these are all slated to be rebuilt very soon, and you won't see any trace of them by the next time you're here.
attributes.name: Dzwonek Rep

attributes.content: Is that so? I rather like how the colorful containers come together to form part of the cityscape.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Er, is that so? I-I suppose Leithanians do have an eye for art.
attributes.name: Dzwonek Rep

attributes.content: Heh, you flatter me.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: It's getting rather late, though. I shan't keep you.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: It's no problem at all! It's been my pleasure to show you our city's nightscape.
attributes.name: Dzwonek Rep

attributes.content: But you also have the ribbon-cutting ceremony to attend tomorrow. Perhaps we should return to the hotel.
attributes.name: Dzwonek Rep

attributes.content: Incidentally, if you enjoy music, I also have a few best-selling albums from Dzwonek here. Would you like to have a listen to them in your room?
attributes.name: Dzwonek Rep

attributes.content: Ah, that's very kind of you, but I've already picked the pieces I wish to enjoy tonight. I hope I'm causing no offense?
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Er, no, of course not.
attributes.name: Dzwonek Rep

attributes.content: Then I will take my leave here. Good night, and we will be back to pick you up tomorrow.
attributes.name: Dzwonek Rep

attributes.content: I've asked around, sir.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: But are you really sure you want to go at this hour?
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Are we being watched?
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Not right now, as far as I can tell.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Then let's. I'd prefer to end this trip on a high note.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: How do you feel?
attributes.name: Rowdy Stowaway

attributes.content: How do you think I feel? Does my leg look like it's getting better?
attributes.name: Injured Infected Knight

attributes.content: This was from a legit pharmacy, and it cost a pretty penny. It's not working?
attributes.name: Rowdy Stowaway

attributes.content: Wouldn't be the first time stuff from legit sources didn't work.
attributes.name: Injured Infected Knight

attributes.content: What happens to the plan if you can't walk?
attributes.name: Rowdy Stowaway

attributes.content: Shh...
attributes.name: Injured Infected Knight

attributes.content: Someone's coming.
attributes.name: Injured Infected Knight

attributes.content: Ahem. Er, may I help you, sir?
attributes.name: Rowdy Stowaway

attributes.content: We have nothing to do with any attacks, and we don't know that man you're with.
attributes.name: Rowdy Stowaway

attributes.content: The cops have been here a few times already. Everyone checked out clean.
attributes.name: Rowdy Stowaway

attributes.content: ...I'm looking for the Weaver.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Oh, you're friends with them? Didn't look like it.
attributes.name: Rowdy Stowaway

attributes.content: Go around behind that dark-red container. You'll find an empty tailor shop with a hidden door in the back, leading to a long alley. Ask around when you reach their warehouse.
attributes.name: Rowdy Stowaway

attributes.content: Not even a word of thanks?
attributes.name: Rowdy Stowaway

attributes.content: What'd you expect from a noble?
attributes.name: Injured Infected Knight

attributes.content: Back to the plan. You got word from the boss?
attributes.name: Injured Infected Knight

attributes.content: Yeah, it's urgent, and it's happening tonight. Getting cold feet?
attributes.name: Rowdy Stowaway

attributes.content: A little, but it's like fighting gloompincers—there's no turning back.
attributes.name: Injured Infected Knight

attributes.content: ...It'll be worth it even if just to make the people in high places sweat a little.
attributes.name: Injured Infected Knight

attributes.content: I heard they're finally cleaning up that junk across the street, and expanding the commercial district towards the east.
attributes.name: Serious Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Finally.
attributes.name: Tired Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Yeah, they should've blown it up ages ago. We've got kids from nearby schools playing hide-and-seek in it, and that's an accident waiting to happen.
attributes.name: Serious Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Who knows how filthy it is in all those containers and shacks? Homeless, Infected...
attributes.name: Serious Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Seriously, why do they even want to live in slums like that? Life would be so much better if they left for one of the villages in the barrenlands.
attributes.name: Serious Corporate Employee

attributes.content: The light's green. Let's go—
attributes.name: Serious Corporate Employee

attributes.content: A loud noise, and the grey skies of the abandoned district are lit up by flames.
Wh-What was that? Something exploded?
attributes.name: Serious Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Run!
attributes.name: Serious Corporate Employee

attributes.content: Why are you just standing there like that? Get out of the way!
attributes.name: Serious Corporate Employee

attributes.content: ...Did I hear you say that kids from nearby schools play in the abandoned district?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: *cough* *cough*... Aloisia!
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Are you okay, sir?
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: I'm sorry, I didn't realize...
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Don't blame yourself. I'm not hurt, and I was the one who insisted on coming to the slums.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: But it looks like there's a wall of rubble between us.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: I'll find another path and meet up with you, sir.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: The explosion was rather near our position, however.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Please be careful, as this could potentially be a targeted attack.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: ...Alright, I'll wait here.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: I hear voices...
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: It hurts... ow...
attributes.name: Sobbing Child

attributes.content: Come on, get this sheet of metal off him! He's bleeding!
attributes.name: Anxious Child

attributes.content: I'm trying, I'm trying... it's so dark, I can't see...
attributes.name: Nervous Child

attributes.content: What if I make a mistake and open up the wound...
attributes.name: Nervous Child

attributes.content: (Even if people are watching... I should be able to use Originium Arts to move some of the stones and metal for them without drawing attention.)
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: (Was this really targeted at me though? My visit to the abandoned district wasn't on the itinerary.)
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: (And Aloisia would have noticed if someone was tailing me.)
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: It's dark... I wanna go home...
attributes.name: Sobbing Child

attributes.content: You're not gonna leave me, right...?
attributes.name: Sobbing Child

attributes.content: Hold on, let's grab a rock... Hey, is someone coming?
attributes.name: Anxious Child

attributes.content: (A businessman? Government official?)
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: (No, it's the man I encountered beneath the statue yesterday... with an Infected by his side.)
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: (He's deeply prejudiced against Leithanien, and the Infected with him doesn't exactly seem like the amicable sort. I should stay out of sight.)
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: ...Did you see an Infected with a white scar on his arm?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Nervous Child

attributes.content: I don't care who you are, we're not scared of you...
attributes.name: Anxious Child

attributes.content: ...What's going on here?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: C-Could you help get our friend out? His leg got caught on a sharp piece of metal, and it bleeds if he tries to move.
attributes.name: Nervous Child

attributes.content: (Did he just glance at me?)
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: If only I had my tools... If this was one of our workers, we'd have just dragged him out.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: ...I don't have any better ideas.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Waaaaaaahhhhh!
attributes.name: Sobbing Child

attributes.content: I-It's bleeding... the wound looks scary...
attributes.name: Nervous Child

attributes.content: Don't cry, I'll tie it up with some clothes.
attributes.name: Anxious Child

attributes.content: And don't worry, my dad used to get hurt all the time. He says a couple of days is all it takes to get better.
attributes.name: Anxious Child

attributes.content: ...Just a flesh wound.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Get it treated at a hospital.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Alright... come on, take my shoulder.
attributes.name: Nervous Child

attributes.content: Leithanian.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: How long do you plan on watching from there?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: This abandoned district is even worse than the Infected district in the Grand Knight Territory... When I catch that brat, he's getting a stern lesson on where is and is not appropriate for a noble to visit.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: ...Dammit, where did he go?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Hey, did you see any kids playing around here?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Whose kid? It's such a big place, I can't possibly remember the face of every kid...
attributes.name: Panicked Refugee

attributes.content: Then cut the crap.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Why are you trying to run? There's nowhere else for you people to go in this city anyway.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Look, I'll pay you to go back and rescue any children you see.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: And if you run into anyone else, you can tell them too. That I'll pay for each child that they bring back to me.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Wh-Who are you? This isn't some kind of sick joke, is it?
attributes.name: Panicked Refugee

attributes.content: Here's the cash. You can choose whether you want it or not.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: T-This is...?! Yes, sir, whatever you say, sir!
attributes.name: Panicked Refugee

attributes.content: Sending people into a fire, eh? Must be nice having money to burn.
Mr. 'Plastic' Szewczyk.
attributes.name: Sinister Refugee

attributes.content: I have no idea what you're talking about.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Don't worry, I know a lot of things, and you're not one of the important ones.
attributes.name: Sinister Refugee

attributes.content: If you're not here to help, then don't waste my time.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Let me put it this way... obsolete goods like you are worth less than nothing. It takes a bigger target to start this fire.
attributes.name: Sinister Refugee

attributes.content: What do you mean? Who caused the explosion?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Who dares harm my son?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: No need to shout, you don't scare me.
attributes.name: Sinister Refugee

attributes.content: But I do enjoy watching rich folks like you flee for your lives, losing whatever you hold dearest.
attributes.name: Sinister Refugee

attributes.content: If you think you can get under my nerves with this crap, then you're wasting your time and mine.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Look. That billboard is about to fall.
attributes.name: Sinister Refugee

attributes.content: How many evacuees will it kill, and will your son be among them? Wanna bet?
attributes.name: Sinister Refugee

attributes.content: An arrow whistles past him before he can finish his sentence.
Tch.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Zero, and no.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: The billboard is now pinned to a wall by the arrow.
Now, let's talk business.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: I could use a guide who knows the lay of the land here.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: You want to go in yourself?
attributes.name: Sinister Refugee

attributes.content: I'm finding my son and getting him out of here. Now get moving, unless you'd like to be pinned to a wall too?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: I must warn you that any threat made upon my life will result in a diplomatic incident between Kazimierz and Leithanien.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Diplomatic incident? You'd better explain why you're here, first. Since when were our slums considered a tourist attraction?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: I don't recall threatening you either. All I did was tell you to come with us.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: You're hostile towards me... towards Leithanien.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Do you really think your deceitful words and suspicious activities truly represent all of Leithanien?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Perhaps we've misunderstood each other. Someone else is responsible for the explosion.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: But I will not let my guard down against you. My hand is on my wand.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Suit yourself.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: S-Sir, someone's calling for help over there. Can you hear it?
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: Should we help or... well, actually, I was wondering, aren't you afraid of being arrested for being with me like this?
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: There's no reason for them to do that.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: And you're not worried about getting infected?
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: ...Let's go.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: If you here to help these people, I'm more than willing to demonstrate my good faith.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Of standing around and doing nothing?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: ...I regret not using my Originium Arts to aid the child, out of concern for my own safety.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Visitor from Leithanien... why did you come here?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: ...Please don't doubt my good faith.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: To be honest, I came here because I envy the cities of Kazimierz.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: ...The modern Kazimierz?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Yes, where nobles, entrepreneurs, and commoners can all walk on the same street without anyone having to give way to one another.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Where the goods in the shops are made for everyone, whether they can use Originium Arts or not, whether they appreciate music or not.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Here, people can pursue any lifestyle they want, as long as they have money, and there is plenty of opportunity for that.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: I only wish the people in my fief had the same energy, and that more of them could live better lives...
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Opportunity? A better life? Don't tell me someone of your position and experience could be blinded by superficial appearances?
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Of course I understand that I'm only being shown the best side. I've seen more than enough gold and jewels in the brief time that I've been here.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Which is exactly why I wanted to come to where the poor live, to see the people whom your rules have cast aside.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Thus, I will learn from them and improve upon the system.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: No, I don't want to die! I can't walk yet... please...
attributes.name: Faint Cry for Help

attributes.content: A secondary explosion...
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: It must be due to the high temperatures.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: It's dangerous here... Are we really going to look for the person you mentioned? What if they've already fled?
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: I can't have you getting hurt helping me.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: ...I have my own business here.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: If you truly are acting in good faith, Leithanian, you will open a path here.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: There may yet be hope, if we head there immediately.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: The voice came from behind the wall.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: The door's warped... I'll try to clear a way with my Arts.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: ...It'll take some time though.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Go ahead. If I'd meant to harm you, I would've done so by now.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Very well...
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: *cough*... The fire's spreading.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: I was caught in a fire once, many years ago.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Someone tried to set the count's tower ablaze, the day the Witch King's light faded from Leithanien.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: The arsonist was never found. Perhaps many who had been slaves to fear threw kindling upon the flames all at once, the moment they could breathe again.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: The fire itself didn't cause too much damage. My father's casters quickly brought it under control.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Treasures could be replaced, as could servants.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: But I couldn't help but think... that the fact that I continue to live in comfort and luxury is perhaps the reason they lit that fire.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: And what of you? Why do you stand in the flames with no fear on your face? Even if you deny it, you look like one who has seen the burning fires of war up close.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: —Done.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: The voice becomes increasingly discernable as the dust clears.

The faint light of Originium Arts illuminates a room that looks like it has been turned over. Furniture is scattered across the ground, and any signs of life are long gone from the body buried beneath the rubble.
The only sound comes from a radio on the ground.
Here are the assignments for squads around Dzwonek for the new equipment test.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: Intel obtained from the captured Leithanian spy indicates that Leithanien has developed multiple Arts Units designed to penetrate Kazimierz knight armor.
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: In preparation for the war with Leithanien—
attributes.name: Radio

attributes.content: A hand snatches up the radio and smashes it on the ground.
The Leithanian noble grows pale as he processes what he just heard.
Dzwonek, an important military outpost, still has 'the bones of sentry towers and turrets hidden in the corners.'
This was what he told the Kazimierz knight standing before him, the day before.
The great steel eye remains focused on Leithanien, on him.
I... I didn't hear anything...
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: I don't know...
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: His eyes land on the caster rapidly approaching his counterpart from behind.
Aloisia! Kill him!
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Yes, sir.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: We'll be trapped by the fire if you don't turn back.
attributes.name: Sinister Refugee

attributes.content: You've rescued everyone who could be rescued along the way. Doesn't look like anyone else is breathing down here.
attributes.name: Sinister Refugee

attributes.content: Neither of us found what we were looking for, but... one less piece of intel doesn't make a huge difference.
attributes.name: Sinister Refugee

attributes.content: As for you, I'm sure you have dozens of sons waiting for you on the main street by now.
attributes.name: Sinister Refugee

attributes.content: Someone's fighting? Here?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Let go of my wand, Infected!
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: You'd better be prepared to get Infected blood on you, if you want to harm my savior.
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: ...Out of the way, Zeno.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Zeno

attributes.content: An arrow whistles past the young Infected's cheek, just as he is pushed away.
Blasted Infected! I remember your face! You're the culprit behind the riots!
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: And you, Młynar Nearl! I knew someone was backing them.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: What are you plotting? What are you doing here? House Nearl just can't help but side with the Infected, can it?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Who are you to question House Nearl—
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Why are you dragging us into trouble, this far away from the Grand Knight Territory?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Let's go, Aloisia!
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: ...You let the Leithanians get away.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Answer me! What are you planning? Where's my son?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Enough. Do you really believe everything the press reports? Don't tell me you're still as foolish as the day you first lost in that ridiculous competition, and drowned yourself in wine.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: You—
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: ...I saw a boy with purple hair.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: If he has the slightest sense of responsibility, he'll have accompanied his friend to the hospital.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Alright, I'll believe you for now.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: But there will be hell to pay if he's not there.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: And you, Weaver.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: Oh, you're...
attributes.name: Sinister Refugee

attributes.content: You're looking for them?
attributes.name: Sinister Refugee

attributes.content: We want to talk to the bounty hunters. Now.
attributes.name: Młynar

attributes.content: This should be far enough... He didn't come after us. He must have been delayed.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: How are your injuries, Aloisia?
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Just a scratch I took on the counter.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: You won't be doing anything so dangerous when we're back in Leithanien. You'll have plenty of time to recover.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: Yes, sir. I apologize.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Anybody watching us?
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: No, sir.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: The reporters at the exit to the street are busy interviewing someone. They won't be paying attention.
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: Then let's go.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: We must leave Kazimierz, now.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: What about tomorrow's ceremony?
attributes.name: Bodyguard

attributes.content: ...It's a shame.
attributes.name: Leithanian Noble

attributes.content: You saved the lives of 22 children! What is your name and occupation? Are you an experienced rescuer?
attributes.name: Excited Reporter

attributes.content: How many of the children do you know? What made you decide to help so many people whom you've never met?
attributes.name: Excited Reporter

attributes.content: Where did you find them? We saw an injured child being sent to the hospital. What did you feel as you rescued him?
attributes.name: Sentimental Reporter

attributes.content: Out of the way, out of the way.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: I need to find my son.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Your outfit is similar to the so-called 'Plastic Knight,' who hasn't been seen for a while. Are you a fan of his? Did he inspire you to this valorous deed?
attributes.name: Curious Reporter

attributes.content: Plastic armor's good enough. I'm an archer, and I don't let the opponent get near me.
attributes.name: Independent Knight Szewczyk

attributes.content: It may have been fun and games, but it's also true that nobody's come close to matching me.
attributes.name: Independent Knight Szewczyk

attributes.content: And think about it: there will be no ads printed on this armor.
attributes.name: Independent Knight Szewczyk

attributes.content: When I'm interviewed as the winner, I'll let the world know that I made it myself.
attributes.name: Independent Knight Szewczyk

attributes.content: It'll be a slap in the face for those big companies, for taking away our livelihoods with inferior mass-produced goods.
attributes.name: Independent Knight Szewczyk

attributes.content: Don't cry, I'll be fine. I'll yield if things aren't looking good, and I'll be back with you safe and sound.
attributes.name: Independent Knight Szewczyk

attributes.content: ...It's too late for an interview.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Like I said, I'm picking up my son.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: One informant was 'unfortunately' lost in the accident, just as planned. No other casualties.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: Target has returned to his hotel, accompanied by his bodyguard.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: That's unfortunate. It would have given us an edge at the negotiation table if he'd gone off on his own and gotten into an accident at the abandoned district.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: But impromptu plans rarely go smoothly.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: What about Nearl?
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Unknown.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: ...He must have left with someone familiar with the secret passages.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Also, a letter just arrived.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: At this hour?
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: Yes, sir. For your eyes only.
attributes.name: Campaign Knight

attributes.content: From the bounty hunters... alright, back to your station.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: You know I keep my promises, Toland.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: A certain someone says he recently dreamt of us? Come on, you must be so worried that you can't sleep.
I know what you're planning, Czcibor, and I suggest you think twice.
You were always the calmest and most rational of us.
I didn't use force or cause any trouble. All that happened is that someone sent us records of Gale Industries and your knightclub working with each other.
Ha. As if there were another way.
attributes.name: Czcibor

attributes.content: A man who did not wish to be named rescued more than 20 children from the fire in the abandoned district.
attributes.name: TV News

attributes.content: Although he declined to talk about his experience and avoided cameras, witnesses report that his cloak was covered in ashes.
attributes.name: TV News

attributes.content: You were really cool, Dad.
attributes.name: Loud Boy

attributes.content: Ha. Now you think so?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: I want to be a knight too.
attributes.name: Loud Boy

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Why not?
attributes.name: Loud Boy

attributes.content: I want to be able to save people, just like you.
attributes.name: Loud Boy

attributes.content: That's not how it happened.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: You always spend the whole day at home working on this stuff. Why not make me a suit of plastic armor too?
attributes.name: Loud Boy

attributes.content: Mom said we didn't use to have so much money. You used to make your own equipment because you had no sponsors.
attributes.name: Loud Boy

attributes.content: She told you all that?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Never mind. Starting tomorrow, you don't need to go to school. In fact, you're not allowed to go out at all until I say it's okay.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Huh? But I need to visit my friend at the hospital.
attributes.name: Loud Boy

attributes.content: No. Haven't you learned your lesson? Do you want to sleep in a hospital bed too?
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: I'm not scared! Knights aren't scared of things like that!
attributes.name: Loud Boy

attributes.content: Like I said... forget about becoming a knight. Knights can't protect people like you think.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: The bigger the dream, the bigger the disappointment.
attributes.name: Szewczyk

attributes.content: Now get to bed.
attributes.name: Szewczyk
